scripts.build:publish-packages: pnpm --filter @ekairos/domain run build && pnpm --filter @ekairos/sandbox run build && pnpm --filter @ekairos/thread run build && pnpm --filter @ekairos/dataset run build && pnpm --filter @ekairos/structure run build && pnpm --filter @ekairos/story-react run build && pnpm --filter @ekairos/openai-reactor run build && pnpm --filter @ekairos/testing run build && pnpm --filter ekairos-cli run build && pnpm --filter ekairos run build

scripts.ship:minor: npm version minor && pnpm run build:publish-packages && pnpm run prepare-publish && git add . && git commit -m "chore: prepare packages for publication" && pnpm run publish:latest
scripts.ship:patch: npm version patch && pnpm run build:publish-packages && pnpm run prepare-publish && git add . && git commit -m "chore: prepare packages for publication" && pnpm run publish:latest
